items.title: Laphroaig Releases 2025 Càirdeas Lore Cask Strength
items.excerpt: Laphroaig recently launched the 2025 edition of its annual Càirdeas release. This year’s bottle is Lore Cask Strength, an update to the classic Lore expression, which has always been a fan favorite. Now you can experience it straight out of the cask at 59.6% ABV.

items.title: Jim Beam Launches Second Edition of Its Lineage Bourbon
items.excerpt: Jim Beam Lineage is a new, limited-edition Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey that’s a collaboration between Fred Noe, 7th-generation master distiller of Jim Beam, and his son Freddie Noe, the 8th generation of the Beam family to carry on the whiskey-making legacy.
